oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph of nine soldiers of 333rd Prisoner of War Escort Company
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This photograph of soldiers includes Mess Sgt. Reba L. Howard. Shown are men serving in the 333rd PWE [Prisoner of War Escort] Company. The men stand or sit in two rows, and most wear their overseas caps.The picture is labeled: "In France after close of World War I/Stationed near Aigrefeuille (France)." Howard, of Henagar, Alabama, trained at Camp Wadsworth, Spartanburg, South Carolina. He was listed as a "collector" on his order to report to his local draft board.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Howard, Reba L.
